technology: There were no technical difficulties experienced by the participant.
cur_neg_affect: The participant did not express any negative affect about the pandemic/masks/vaccine/boosters in the present.
past_neg_affect: The participant mentioned that she had to defer going to grad school because of the pandemic, which is a minor negative affect.
communal_orientation: The participant was talking and asking questions but not giving affirmations, and seemed engaged in the conversation.
engagement: The participant was engaged in the conversation and genuinely conversing with her partner.
defensiveness: The participant was not at all defensive in justifying her beliefs/perspective.
vaccine_importance: The participant seemed to believe that vaccines are important, but not extremely important.
booster_importance: The participant seemed to believe that boosters are somewhat important.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrated a moderate amount of cognitive complexity.
general_notes: The participant was very polite and respectful.
